description: This Python script demonstrates the usage of the 'agno' package to create and run agents with DALL-E tools for image generation, including example prompts and downloading the generated image.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that can execute tools and respond to prompts.

classes.name: DalleTools
classes.description: A tool class for interfacing with DALL-E image generation models.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Prints the response from the agent, optionally in markdown format.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Executes the agent with a given prompt and returns the response.
